TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TrustSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class TrustSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 配置应用于应用程序的代码访问安全级别。

span.span: Configures the code-access security level that is applied to an application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类允许您以编程方式访问和修改配置文件``部分。The class lets you programmatically access and modify the configuration file `` section. ``部分配置用于运行特定应用程序的代码访问安全性权限集。The `` section configures the code-access-security permissions set that is used to run a particular application. 此节可以在计算机、 站点和应用程序级别声明。This section can be declared at the machine, site, and application levels. ## Examples 本部分提供两个代码示例。This section provides two code examples. 第一个示例演示如何以声明方式指定的多个属性的值类。The first demonstrates how to declaratively specify values for several properties of the class. 第二个演示如何使用类型。The second demonstrates how to use the type. 下面的配置文件示例演示如何以声明方式指定的多个属性的值类。The following configuration file example shows how to declaratively specify values for several properties of the class. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类型。The following code example demonstrates how to use the type. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection/CS/trustsection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection/VB/trustsection.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 使用默认设置初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using default settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它是由 ASP.NET 配置系统调用的。It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. 获取实例类通过方法。You obtain an instance of the class by using the method. 下表显示的默认设置的用于构造函数。The following table shows the default settings that are used for the constructor. |设置Setting|默认值Default value| |-------------|-------------------| ||`Full`| ||`""`|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ HostSecurityPolicyResolverType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置自定义安全策略解决方案类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the custom security-policy resolution type.

value.span: 自定义安全策略解决方案类型。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果为空字符串，应用程序使用 ASP.NET 默认策略来确定程序集的权限。If is an empty string, the application uses ASP.NET default policy to determine an assembly's permissions. 默认策略用于评估的权限授予完全信任的全局程序集缓存 (GAC) 程序集和对其他程序集的部分信任。The default policy for evaluating permissions grants full trust to the Global Assembly Cache (GAC) assemblies and partial trust to the other assemblies. 此属性不能设置为`null`值。This attribute cannot be set to a `null` value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool LegacyCasModel { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用了旧版代码访问安全性。

span.span: Gets or set a value that indicates whether the legacy code access security is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用了旧版代码访问安全性，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if legacy code access security is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用旧版代码访问安全性后，以下的安全规则将适用：When legacy code access security is enabled, the following security rules apply: - 代码访问安全性 (CAS) 策略被建立从计算机策略和指定的 ASP.NET 部分信任策略文件的组合。Code access security (CAS) policy is established from the combination of machine policy and the specified ASP.NET partial trust policy file. - 部分信任应用程序域还原为完全信任应用程序域级别。Partial trust application domains revert to being full trust at the application domain level. - 位于中的 CONFIG 目录中的旧的部分信任文件[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]安装目录而不是新的部分信任配置文件位于同一目录中使用。The legacy partial trust files located in the CONFIG directory in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] install directory are used instead of the new partial trust configuration files that are located in the same directory. 旧文件包括在中找到的成员资格条件[!INCLUDE[net_v11_long](~/includes/net-v11-long-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[net_v20SP1_short](~/includes/net-v20sp1-short-md.md)]版本[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。The legacy files include the membership conditions that were found in the [!INCLUDE[net_v11_long](~/includes/net-v11-long-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v20SP1_short](~/includes/net-v20sp1-short-md.md)] versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. - 将应用用于评估权限的其他成员资格条件，在 ASP.NET 部分信任文件中定义。Additional membership conditions to evaluate permissions are applied, as defined in ASP.NET partial trust files. 附带的 CONFIG 目录[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]版本包含旧的部分信任策略文件。The CONFIG directory that ships with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] release contains legacy partial-trust policy files. 这些文件的名称包括字符串"旧"，并且包含[!INCLUDE[net_v20SP1_short](~/includes/net-v20sp1-short-md.md)]部分。The names of these files include the string "legacy" and contain the [!INCLUDE[net_v20SP1_short](~/includes/net-v20sp1-short-md.md)] sections. 以下各节包含所需评估 CAS 策略针对的程序集的非空成员资格条件。These sections contain non-empty membership conditions that are needed to evaluating CAS policy against assemblies. - 如果 ASP.NET 应用程序在部分信任和信任级别映射的安全策略文件中运行到默认部分信任配置文件之一，ASP.NET 会自动选择相应的旧配置文件。If the ASP.NET application is running in partial trust and the security policy file for the trust level maps to one of the default partial trust configuration files, ASP.NET automatically chooses the corresponding legacy configuration file. 例如，如果通常会从 Web_mediumtrust.config 加载安全策略，然后在旧模式下 ASP.NET 将改为安全策略从加载 Legacy.web_mediumtrust.config。For example, if the security policy would ordinarily be loaded from Web_mediumtrust.config, then in legacy mode ASP.NET will instead load security policy from Legacy.web_mediumtrust.config.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Level { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置安全级别的名称，应用程序将在此安全级别下运行。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the security level under which the application will run.
The name of the trust level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定应用程序将在其进行运行的安全级别。The property specifies the security level under which the application will be run. 默认值为 `"Full"`。The default is `"Full"`. 有五个可用的信任级别：There are five available trust levels: - 完整Full - 高High - 中Medium - 低Low - 最低Minimal 在中定义与安全级别相对应的命名的级别``元素``。The named levels correspond to the security levels that are defined in the `` element for ``. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection/CS/trustsection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection/VB/trustsection.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ OriginUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 指定应用程序的源 URL。

span.span: Specifies the URL of origin for an application.

value.span: 格式良好的 HTTP URL 或空字符串 ("")。

span.span: A well-formed HTTP URL or an empty string ("").

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定的应用程序的源 URL。The property specifies the URL of origin for an application. 如果存在，这可用于某些权限，如与关联的那些类。If present, this can be used for some permissions, such as those associated with the class. 这使您可以指定用于创建权限通过单一 URL实例。This enables you to specify a single URL that is used to create permission through a instance. 然后此权限授予具有部分信任的 ASP.NET 代码执行到该 URL 的 HTTP 调用 （例如，Web 服务调用） 的权限。This permission then grants ASP.NET code that has partial trust the right to make HTTP calls (for example, a Web service call) to that URL. 值必须是格式正确的 HTTP URL。The value must be a well-formed HTTP URL. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection/CS/trustsection.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.TrustSection/VB/trustsection.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PermissionSetName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置权限集的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the permission set.
The name of the permission set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够在部分信任配置文件中定义的应用程序域初始化期间使用的命名的权限集。The property enables you to define in a partial trust configuration file the named permission set that is used during the initialization of an application domain. 默认情况下，属性是"ASP.Net"这是用于初始化应用程序域的权限集的名称。By default, the property is "ASP.Net" This is the name of the permission set that is used to initialize the application domain. 此属性不能设置为一个空字符串或`null`值。This attribute cannot be set to an empty string or a `null` value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ProcessRequestInApplicationTrust { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示页请求是否自动只限于在信任策略文件中配置的权限，该文件应用于 ASP.NET 应用程序。

span.span: Gets or set a value that indicates whether page requests are automatically restricted to the permissions that are configured in the trust policy file that is applied to the ASP.NET application.

value.span: 如果请求自动只限于在信任策略文件中配置的权限，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if requests are automatically restricted to the permissions that are configured in the trust policy file; otherwise, .
